==Installing old gems
Specify the version to install, e.g.:
 jruby -S gem install jruby-openssl -v 0.3

==Using old gems in your script
 require 'rubygems'   # not required in a rails controller
 gem 'jruby-openssl', '0.3'
 gem 'net-ssh', '2.0.4'
 require 'net/ssh'
